channel.title: Stat Hover Problem

item.title: Stat Hover Problem
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

My source that i’m using only works with the insidia client so i have to use that and my stat hovers go off the client. Can someone fix this for me im pretty sure its the code for it. I tried fixing it and it didn’t work after.

sT.child(101, 9215, 3, 5); sT.child(102, 9216, 66, 5); sT.child(103, 9217, 128, 5); sT.child(104, 9218, 3, 33); sT.child(105, 9219, 66, 33); sT.child(106, 9220, 128, 33); sT.child(107, 9221, 3, 61); sT.child(108, 9222, 66, 61); sT.child(109, 9223, 128, 61); sT.child(110, 9224, 3, 89); sT.child(111, 9225, 66, 89); sT.child(112, 9226, 128, 89); sT.child(113, 9227, 3, 117); sT.child(114, 9228, 66, 117); sT.child(115, 9229, 128, 117); sT.child(116, 9230, 3, 145); sT.child(117, 9231, 66, 145); sT.child(118, 9232, 128, 145); sT.child(119, 9233, 3, 173); sT.child(120, 9234, 66, 173); sT.child(121, 9235, 128, 173); sT.child(122, 9236, 3, 201); sT.child(123, 9237, 66, 201); sT.child(124, 9238, 128, 201); sT.child(125, 9239, 3, 229);
